subject: Suite 3 Design download
body:
No one really listens to anyone else, and if you try it for a while you'll see why.

If you torture data long enough, it will tell you anything you want !

Divorce is the sacrament of adultery.

If you can't be happy where you are, it's a cinch you can't be happy where you ain't.

Most people who ask for advice from others have already resolved to act as it pleases them.

Only things the dreamers make live on. They are the eternal conquerors.

A failure is a man who has blundered, but is not able to cash in on the experience.

Its easy to be an angel when you are in heaven.

Common sense hides shame.

Every man, however wise, needs the advice of some sagacious friend in the affairs of life.

The only way to amuse some people is to slip and fall on an icy pavement.

Marxism is like a classical building that followed the Renaissance beautiful in its way, but incapable of growth.

Who is more foolish, the child afraid of the dark, or the man afraid of the light?
